hero_subtitle: The Miraculous Sleeping Idol established by Arjuna
mantra_text: Manojavan Marutatulyavegam Jitendriyam Buddhimatam Varishtham | Vatatmajam Vanarayuthamukhyam Shriramadutam Sharanam Prapadye ||
about_text: Sakariya Hanuman (Bheed Bhanjan) Temple features a rare 10-foot long sleeping idol of Hanumanji. History suggests that during the Mahabharata era, the Pandavas stayed here. On Lord Krishna's advice, Arjuna established and worshipped this idol before the war.
holy_memories_subtitle: Explore the beautiful moments from our past Celebrations, Rituals, and Community Gatherings.
